title: Djinn's Desire
description: He’s determined to make her his.Disguised as a human, Ophir’s been searching for a portal home to the djinn realm for over eight hundred years. Yet the moment he meets a luscious human hairdresser, all he can think about is her. She awakens a part of him he never knew existed, challenges every belief he’s ever held about humanity... and she hates djinn with a passion.Can Ophir persuade her to trust him? More importantly, can he protect her from the rival djinn already attached to her soul?Content warning: Explicit love scenes, demonic genies, and seductive magic. Intended for mature audiences.
author: Tamsin Ley
